definition: as if gaining the most precious treasure

sentences.english: Kitano hidden in captive discovered king unsanitary environment in north division.
sentences.chinese: 北野武藏在俘虏中如获至宝的发现了王师北。

sentences.english: Li Ping did. He wanted his book back.
sentences.chinese: 弄到这本书，他如获至宝。

sentences.english: He was thrilled, since it was the only hymnal in his church.
sentences.chinese: 姥爷如获至宝，因为那是教会里唯一的赞美诗集。

definition: pleasantly surprised like mad (idiom); capering madly with joy/to express boundless pleasure
to love sth too much to part with it (idiom); to fondle admiringly
to be pleased beyond one's expectations (idiom)/overjoyed at the turn of events
to hunger for sth (idiom); eagerly/to long for sth
to burst with joy (idiom)/to be over the moon/to be elated
murky darkness suddenly opens (idiom); a sudden flash of insight and all is clear
brows raised in delight, eyes laughing (idiom); beaming with joy/all smiles
grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness
to present a treasure/to offer a valuable piece of advice/to show off what one treasures
